criteria.Personal_Preference: I prefer recommendations that align with my approach to handling activities and suit my current context. Specifically, I like to receive entertainment recommendations, such as new reality TV shows or YouTube channels, when I'm taking a break from work or feeling stressed. On the other hand, I appreciate practical recommendations, like tips for organizing my home, when I'm in the mood to tackle household chores or when the clutter becomes overwhelming.
criteria.Timing: I prefer to receive recommendations in the late afternoon or early evening, as this is when I'm usually winding down from work and more receptive to new ideas. It's important that these recommendations don't interfere with my work hours or my attempts to relax before bed.
criteria.Frequency: I prefer receiving recommendations twice every day, ideally in a way that avoids excessive interruptions and supports my focus or productivity. There should be a good balance between recommendation intervals and quiet periods, allowing me to process and act on the suggestions without feeling overwhelmed.
criteria.Communication_&_Safety: I prefer recommendations to be communicated in a casual and friendly style that feels accessible and matches my communication preferences. It's also important that they respect my personal ethics and safety boundaries, ensuring that the suggestions are practical and considerate of my current lifestyle and goals.
